feed.title: New BIP32 structure for P2SH multisig wallets

entry.title: New BIP32 structure for P2SH multisig wallets
entry.summary: It seems that the speaker has finally understood something after re-reading Manuel's explanation. Although they initially struggled to understand, they now acknowledge Manuel's clarity in their explanation. The context also includes an HTML attachment that was scrubbed, but no further information is provided about it.
